properties.Name: CustomerLifetimeValue
properties.Description: The total amount the customer is expected to spend on your products during their lifetime.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: ClvTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the CLV was evaluated as of.

Columns.Name: CustomerLifetimeValueAmount
Columns.Description: The amount associated with the Customer Lifetime Value.

Columns.Name: CustomerLifetimeValueNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer Lifetime Value.
